page.title: 17LIFE STYLE OF NEWHAVEN FOLK
page.content: The two local hairdressers are well patronised, with up to 500 customers each week: although many people say they prefer home hairdressing or visiting salons in Brighton or Eastbourne. Local cafes report up to 1,000 customers a day and local people agree that they visit a cafe or restaurant at least once a week. Bingo is played at Newhaven's Social Club, although the majority of people questioned maintained they did not gamble at all, but preferred to visit public houses for entertainment. Pop culture does not cause much concern, although many people did not wish to become involved. Most people preferred pop music to any other kind, with "Wham" as their favourite group. "Coronation Street" was a firm television favourite.
